# isOpen

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the pop-up annotation is in an opened state, displaying its text content, or in a closed state, displaying an icon.

## Declaration

```swift
var isOpen: Bool { get set }
```

## Configuring Pop-Up Annotations

- **popup**: Returns the pop-up annotation associated with an annotation.

items.description: Returns the pop-up annotation associated with an annotation.
